description: Introducing Village Green, Maple Ridge's two-level townhomes. The featured A great floorplan of thoughtfully designed living space that feels like a single-family home. The modern open layout includes a gourmet kitchen with rich bi-colour cabinetry, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a convenient main-level powder room. Upstairs are three spacious bedrooms, including a luxurious ensuite with a large, frameless glass shower. Enjoy the comfort of watching the kids play in your safe, fenced yard or take a stroll to the 2,600 sq. ft. tree-lined community park at the heart of Village Green. Unrivalled location.
